[center][font size=4]Deb-Shiori Change Log[/font][/center]
[font size=3]2020.12.02[/font] - Initial Release
Containers.Overview: Shiori is a simple bookmarks manager written in the Go language. Intended as a simple clone of Pocket. You can use it as a command line application or as a web application.
Containers.Description: Shiori is a simple bookmarks manager written in the Go language. Intended as a simple clone of Pocket. You can use it as a command line application or as a web application.
